extendedInfo.description: Pocket-size RPG packed with epic fights in real-time! Features elements of the best Android titles and classic RPG.Fast-paced dynamic gameplay. Colorful comic-style graphics. Epic battles.HUGE MAGICAL WORLD IN DANGER!Your honorable mission is to protect it. You will find yourself in a quirky fantasy world of Pocket Dragons. They need your help! Defeat their enemies and save them!Build your own small dragon army and combat the forces of Darkness! Manage your dragons, develop their skills, and make your party stronger. Try out various strategies in epic battles. Help your Pocket Dragons protect their world from imminent danger!EXPLORE!Start your adventure with 100+ exciting Campaign missions. Blaze your trail through 6 scenic locations: fields to mountains, desert, volcano and more. Meet a bunch of monsters with unique behavior and abilities. Discover and tame new dragons each with their own unique skills.EXPERIMENT!Train your dragons to make them stronger. Customize dragons abilities to find the strategy that works best and put it into practice.FIGHT!Challenge other players around the world in PvP mode. Engage in epic battles, rise your rank and make it to the top of the global leaderboards.PLAY WITH FRIENDS!Invite your facebook friends to join the game! Exchange gifts, win duels and share your victories!FEATURES:Simple tap controlsGlobal online battles and leaderboards8 different dragons to play6 unique fantastic locations to explore36 enemy typesOver 150 unique items of weapon, armor, etc.

reviews.title: Same same
reviews.comment: Not a bad game, but like all games nowadays, play the same levels over and over and over.......and over...to gain levels.  Or spend the equivalent of a PS3 game, and have fun!
reviews.author: Dave Graham

reviews.title: Its an ok game but is way to hard.
reviews.comment: Tone the difficulty.  Ive spent a few hours and am getting nowhere
reviews.author: Dylan Nguyen

reviews.title: Great fun
reviews.comment: It\'s similar to pokemon, but with dragons so that makes it more fun. The fact that you can equip them with different items and powers rocks. Very addicting and a great time killer
reviews.author: Zach Coffman

reviews.title: If you down mind paying
reviews.comment: I could see this being a really great but I really don\'t like having to pay in order not to have to die 20 times before winning a game
reviews.author: Curtis Harris

reviews.title: best game ever should make pokemon games like that.
reviews.comment: It,s better than any other games I,vegames.
reviews.author: tywan Ward

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Very smooth and very amusing game
reviews.author: William Payne

reviews.title: Pretty good game.
reviews.comment: As it says in the title :-)
reviews.author: Tom Hewett

reviews.title: Pay to win
reviews.comment: Should be less dependent on in application purchases otherwise fun with patience
reviews.author: brock kid

reviews.title: The taste is forgetful
reviews.comment: It starts with a good idea, but then after all the training and constant repetition, it begins to fall short. I played to world 3 and now, i just don\'t feel like playing anymore. Dying, and overcoming, by only long exp grinds, is just a waste of my time.
reviews.author: Gabriel Rodriguez

reviews.title: Super Excellent Good
reviews.comment: Thanks for the 500 coins and 15 gems every 1 week i played!
reviews.author: Liana Mariyanti

reviews.title: Ok freezes a lot though
reviews.comment: It would be 4 if it stopped freezimg so much. Some levels are murderously hard, presumably to get you to pay to play.

reviews.title: Good waste of time
reviews.comment: It\'s challenging and runs pretty good

reviews.title: Fun, cute
reviews.comment: Great game.  Entertaining. But the strategy can get old quickly.  Can be challenging.  But you still get something even if you lose.
